Reviews.Title: Hawk 72-1613 Motion Activated Alarm with Auto Dialer
Reviews.Author: vaxo
Reviews.Content: Hawk 72-1613 Motion Activated Alarm with Auto Dialer Hawk 72-1613 Motion Activated Alarm with Auto Dialer Hawk 72-1613 Motion Activated Alarm with Auto Dialergoooooooooooooooood

Reviews.Title: Not so loud
Reviews.Author: Rsouza
Reviews.Content: Everything in this motion activated alarm with auto dialer works fine but the sound is not that powerful as stated.

Reviews.Title: Bad product and Bad customer service
Reviews.Author: Salt H2O
Reviews.Content: Worked as advertised for ONLY 1 month. Then it caused my phone line to be busy anytime it was connected. Removed batteries and tried again, still made my phone line busy. I e-mailed UniquExceptional and my e-mails were totally ignored, NO response! Spend your money somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: Works as I had hoped
Reviews.Author: J. H. Tuttle
Reviews.Content: The product is reasonably priced and allows for security notification with out the high cost of other alarm systems and service

ProductInfo.Features:
Features include: Simple Operation - can be installed by anyone in only minutes Keypad Operation - arms and disarms using a keypad (you set your own security code) Delay Setting - entry and exit delays help prevent false alarms
Warning Decals - two alarm system warning decals are included Auto Dial Alert - uses your current phone line (an additional line is not required) to call up to three phone numbers with your recorded message
Requires four 'AAA' batteries (not included)Unit measures: 175 x 275 x 675-Inch
ProductInfo.Name: Hawk 72-1613 Motion Activated Alarm with Auto Dialer
